attributes.action: The suspension of Representative Democracy and the introduction of Direct Democracy
attributes.additional_details:
Introduce direct democracy in place of representative democracy.
Introduce regional assemblies so that ‘the people’ can have executive power over their local areas.
Limit the ‘Royal Family’ to just the monarch and their own immediate family
Eventual re-organisation from a monarchy into a crowned republic, with the House of Lords being replaced by a Senate.
Making the House of Commons and the Senate the ‘Head of State’
Any child bared by the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge should be the last monarch.
